1262610.name: Cyberemo 2007 Director's Cut
1262610.description:
Cyberemo 2007 Director's Cut

Everything that has been cut and banned from the main game is now available in this DLC. Uncensored. Extra access to all chapters.

Features:

✔️ Uncensored. All cut content - returned;
✔️ Content cut out for Germany - returned;
✔️ Added a new feature - instant Extra access to any chapter;
✔️ Removed dynamic banners from the main menu;
✔️ In fact, this is a completely reassembled, separate game. Not a DLC;
✔️ Added two secret achievements: Screamer and Bonus;
✔️ An interactive ending has been added, where the plot is explained in detail;
✔️ Redesigned many small items.

DLC restricted in Germany. Why?
Because the mustachioed POTATO shows you the way with your hand!
